onboarding.title: Start Cooking
onboarding.body:
Let's join our community
to cook better food!

shared.invalid_email: The email address is not valid. Please enter a valid email.
shared.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
shared.user_not_found: No user found with this email address.
shared.invalid_recipient_email: The email address is not valid.
shared.too_many_requests: Too many requests, please try again later.
shared.network_request_failed: Network error, please check your connection.

log_in.wrong_password: The password is incorrect. Please try again.
log_in.user_disabled: This user account has been disabled. Please contact support.
log_in.your_email_need_to_verified: Your email is not verified yet. We have sent you a new verification email. Please check your inbox and verify your email to continue.
log_in.session_expired: Your session has expired, please login again
log_in.email_not_registered_message: This email is not registered. Do you want to create a new account?

sign_up.email_already_in_use: The email is already in use by another account.
sign_up.operation_not_allowed: Email/password sign-in is not enabled. Please contact support.
sign_up.weak_password: The password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
sign_up.we_sent_email_verification: We've sent a verification email to you! Please check your inbox and verify your account to continue.
sign_up.username_must_be_between: Username must be between 2 and 20 characters
sign_up.username_can_only_contain: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

forget_password.enter_email_recover_password: Enter your email to recover your password
forget_password.password_reset_link_sent: A password reset link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox to reset your password.

verification_code.we_have_sent_verification_code: We have sent the code to your email
verification_code.verification_success_message: Account created successfully! Your email has been verified, and you can now log in.
verification_code.pls_enter_complete_pin: Please enter the complete PIN code.
verification_code.verification_exit_warning: You have signed up, but verification isn't complete. If you exit now, you'll need to verify again when logging in.
verification_code.forgot_password_exit_warning: You have requested to reset your password, but the process isn't complete. If you exit now, you'll need to start over.

reset_password.reset_password_success: Your password has been reset successfully! You can now log in with your new password.
reset_password.reset_password_exit_warning: The password didn't reset yet, are you sure you want to exit

logout.logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?

profile_setup.profile_picture_optional: You can add a profile picture later.
profile_setup.saving_profile_error: An error occurred while saving your profile. Please try again.

profile.chef_didn't_follow_any_chef_yet: Chef didn't follow any other chef yet
profile.profile_edit_success_message: Your profile edited successfully, go to your profile to see changes
profile.chef_no_recipes: This chef didn't add any recipe yet
profile.chef_no_likes: This chef didn't like any recipe yet
profile.my_profile_no_recipes_message: You didn't add any recipe yet, add one
profile.my_profile_no_likes: You didn't like any recipe yet

upload.tell_a_little_about_your_food: Tell a little about your food
upload.upload_success_message:
Your recipe has been uploaded,
you can see it on your profile

recipe_details.recipe_no_likes_message: No one liked this recipe yet.

search.wrtie_recipe_name_to_search: Write a recipe name to search about
search.no_results_found: We couldn't find any recipes matching your search

global.delete_recipe_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this recipe?
global.min_characters_required: This field requires at least {} characters

errors.bad_request: Invalid request. Please check your input.
errors.unauthorized: Unauthorized access. Please log in again.
errors.forbidden: Access denied. You do not have permission.
errors.conflict: There is a conflict with existing data.
errors.unprocessable_entity: Invalid input. Please check your data.
errors.internal_server_error: An error occurred on the server.
errors.server_error: An error occurred on the server.
errors.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.expired_token: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
errors.account_locked: Too many failed attempts. Your account is temporarily locked.
errors.email_not_verified: Please verify your email before logging in.
errors.insufficient_funds: Insufficient balance to complete the transaction.
errors.payment_declined: Payment was declined. Please check with your bank.
errors.invalid_card_details: Invalid card details. Please check and try again.
errors.data_conflict: There is a conflict with existing data.
errors.invalid_input: Some input fields are incorrect or missing.
errors.file_too_large: The uploaded file is too large.
errors.permission_denied: Permission denied. Please grant access in settings.
errors.device_not_supported: This feature is not supported on your device.
errors.connection_timeout: The request took too long. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.send_timeout: Sending request took too long. Please check your internet and retry.
errors.receive_timeout: The server is taking too long to respond. Try again later.
errors.bad_certificate: Security issue detected. Please contact support.
errors.bad_response: Something went wrong while processing your request. Try again.
errors.request_cancelled: Request was cancelled. Please try again.
errors.no_internet_connection: No internet connection. Please check your network.
errors.validation_error: Some fields are incorrect. Please check and try again.
errors.bad_gateway: Server communication error. Please try again later.
errors.service_unavailable: Service is currently unavailable. Please try again shortly.
errors.gateway_timeout: Server is taking too long to respond. Please try again later.
